scripts.build:all: for dir in */; do if [ -d "$dir" ] && [ -f "$dir/package.json" ]; then echo "Building $dir" && (cd "$dir" && npm run build); fi; done
scripts.dev:all: for dir in */; do if [ -d "$dir" ] && [ -f "$dir/package.json" ]; then echo "Dev build $dir" && (cd "$dir" && npm run dev); fi; done
scripts.clean: for dir in */; do if [ -d "$dir" ] && [ -f "$dir/package.json" ]; then echo "Cleaning $dir" && (cd "$dir" && npm run clean); fi; done
scripts.install:all: for dir in */; do if [ -d "$dir" ] && [ -f "$dir/package.json" ]; then echo "Installing $dir" && (cd "$dir" && npm install); fi; done
